summary: The Civilian Conservation Center Enhancement Act of 2025 aims to amend Public Law 91-378 to enhance Civilian Conservation Centers (CCCs). The bill focuses on workforce development and training, particularly for forestry, wildland firefighting, and related fields. It mandates specialized training programs, pilot programs for workforce development, recruitment and hiring goals for graduates, and a housing pilot program for wildland firefighters. The Secretaries of Agriculture and Interior are tasked with implementing the provisions, including reporting to Congress on underutilized CCC capacity.
